doc: Owning groups don't correctly swap values (not released yet)
As reported on Discord by @andranik3949 (a very good catch, thanks! ðŸ™‚), here it is a small example to reproduce the issue:
const auto group = registry.group< Index >( entt::get< Value > );
std::vector< std::tuple< entt::entity, Index, Value > > beforeDestroy;
registry.view< Index, Value >().each([ & ]( const entt::entity entity, const auto& index, const auto& value ) {
std::vector< std::tuple< entt::entity, Index, Value > > afterDestroy;
registry.view< Index, Value >().each([ & ]( const entt::entity entity, const auto& index, const auto& value ) {

Introduced with [this](https://github.com/skypjack/entt/commit/169b816613ab3bb253c2bc2ac11a75f1f7f4f33c) commit, it hasn't entered any release yet (fortunately). It affects both `master` and `experimental`.
